PreToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && tool_input.command matches "(npm run dev|pnpm( run)? dev|yarn dev|bun run dev)"

hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')
if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then
  console_logs=$(grep -n "console\\.log" "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true)
  if [ -n "$console_logs" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] WARNING: console.log found in $file_path" >&2
    echo "$console_logs" | head -3 >&2
  fi
fi
echo "$input"

#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
file_path=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // ""')
if [ -n "$file_path" ]; then
  base=$(echo "$file_path" | sed 's/\.[^.]*$//')
  test_file="${base}.test.ts"
  spec_file="${base}.spec.ts"
  if [ ! -f "$test_file" ] && [ ! -f "$spec_file" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] REMINDER: No test file found for $file_path" >&2
    echo "[Hook] Consider creating ${test_file}" >&2
  fi
fi
echo "$input"
